home_page.description: QX is a decentralized exchange running as a smart contract on the Qubic network. This demo site provides information about assets, trades, and traders, but it is not the official QX platform.
home_page.entity_search_desc: Show trades and open orders of an entity.

error_page.error_404_message: Congratulations! You are one of the elite who managed to find our 404 page.
error_page.title: Oops!
error_page.unexpected_error: Sorry, an unexpected error has occurred.
